movies.name: Big Trouble in Little China
movies.about: A rough-and-tumble trucker and his side kick face off with an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.about: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.about: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.name: Predator
movies.about: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

movies.name: The Burbs
movies.about: An overstressed suburbanite and his neighbors are convinced that the new family on the block is part of a murderous Satanic cult.

movies.name: Ghostbusters
movies.about: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.
